scenes.background: You suggested Monica ask for help. Bob notices the tension and comments:
scenes.description: Looks like there’s some stress around. Anything I can do to help?

options.text: Just some workload management issues. We’ll figure it out.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the situation without fully addressing it, showing motivation, but empathy and perception were lower.

options.text: Actually, any assistance you can offer would be appreciated.
options.analysis: You accepted help, showing good social skills and self-regulation, but your motivation and empathy could be stronger.

options.text: Thanks, Bob. Maybe you could take on one of Monica’s tasks?
options.analysis: You directly asked for help, demonstrating strong perception and empathy, but your self-regulation could be improved.
